title: Sample Book, ca. 1959
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: This book contains mural miniatures. The designs include Kensington, Dresden Floral, Fountains, Central Park, San Francisco, Meadow Song, Caravan, Flower Cart, Bay Tree, Willow Bank, Snow Pine, Chinese Modern, Viennese Garden, Sorrento, Centurion, Linden Bower, Bird & Flower, Pheasant, Zodiac Maps and Stags. Each mural is shown is multiple colorways.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, ca. 1959.
ca. 1959. Screen printed. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-193.
